thread.title: Active: the all-action alternatives
thread.title_full: Active: the all-action alternatives | The Sunday Times

author: Chris Haslam
title: Active: the all-action alternatives
text:
45: Gear up for Colombia (Joolze Dymond) Unless stated, prices are for seven nights, B&B, including flights and transfers
41 Beach safari, Tanzania
11h10m 31 9
Want to go on safari and have some beach time? Look no further than the Sanctuary Saadani, in Saadani National Park. Elephants, lions and leopards can all be tracked here, and the Wami River is home to huge numbersof hippos and crocodiles. You don’t need to share with them: there are two pools at camp and all the bush luxury that Africa does so well.
From £3,995pp, full-board, including all game-viewing activities; 01242 855469, abercrombiekent.co.uk
42 Hiking in the Canaries
8h20m 20 6
El Hierro is a vertiginous volcanic island just within sight of Tenerife. It’s home to wild landscapes and a charming population of itchy-footed folk seemingly arrived from all corners of the Hispanic-speaking world. The longest day on this self-guided walking adventure is seven miles, with an 1,800ft ascent,
